DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to collect information about how the new sound-processing affects the ability to hear in everyday listening situations.
DOC.brief_title: ClearVoice Sound-processing Strategy for AB HiRes 120 Cochlear Implant Users
DOC.criteria: Postlingually deafened, experienced (6 months device use), adult users of the Harmony HiResolution Bionic Ear System and HiRes Fidelity 120 sound processing. English language proficiency
